basic_info.name: Why choose Nimra College of Engineering and Technology?
description: Placements in top companies: NCET has earned itself a reputation of producing talents who have cracked interviews in some of the top companies of the country. Most of the passed students are working successfully in established companies from various fields.

Widespread campus with quality facilities: The college is spread over an area of 2,00,000 sq.ft which houses well developed buildings comprising of quality infrastructure including foundry lab, CAD/CAM lab, machines lab, MOS lab, workshop, library, provision for different games, transportation, cafeteria, etc.

Section.name: About NCET
Section.description:
Nimra College of Engineering and Technology (NCET) is situated close to Ibrahimpatnam and has the reputation of being amongst the top engineering colleges in the coastal region of Andhra Pradesh. It is managed and promoted by Nimra Educational Society and offers degrees in various fields of engineering. It offers undergraduate courses in six different fields and post-graduate courses in eleven branches. It wishes to provide high quality education in engineering and technology for all kinds of students irrespective of caste, creed or religion. It holds the certification of Permanent Muslim Minority Status from the Government of Andhra Pradesh. By providing technically advanced education and utilizing strong industrial links, NCET aims at nurturing young and talented individuals into successful and highly competent professionals.

Widespread campus with quality facilities: The college is spread over an area of 2,00,000 sq.ft which houses well developed buildings comprising of quality infrastructure including foundry lab, CAD/CAM lab, machines lab, MOS lab, workshop, library, provision for different games, transportation, cafeteria, etc.
